text: 5.37: Ru 2.1-2Ana ŋaar fhɨrgerɨgap, mbar vuim, mbe mba gumgi gu mbigi zɨri ndi tugen, Gariri guma Zudas, ana hɨgap khaŋ nzuai, ‘Gu zɨ ki.’ Ana maaŋ suaŋgiap, mbaram gumgi mbari ana mbe ndigim, mbe ana zɨn vui. Mbe ana zɨn vuim, ana hɨgap ntara khavgim, mbe ana shogim, ana rimgim, mba ana zɨn vov ana khothɨgi gumgi, mbe mbara muuŋgiap rav tamtam vegim, ana ŋaar vhɨra fhɨrgerɨgi.
